summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of West 61st Street from 32nd Avenue Northwest to a point approximately 425 feet west of 32nd Avenue Northwest; by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 7989 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
